steps.text: Clean new external composite surface with approved cleaner.
Use approved cleaner to remove mold release materials.
Sand old or new gelcoat to remove imperfections.
Apply dry guide coat and re-sand to ensure even texture.
Clean repair area with approved cleaner or blow off using pressured air.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Blister Repair Filler, fill 85% of the cavity.
Wait 30 minutes.
Feather the repair with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive disc, grade 80+.
Apply dry guide coat and re-sand.
Clean the area.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
Wait for filler to cure.
Sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II grade 120+ abrasive discs.
Sand the repair area with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II grade 220+.
Ensure surface is dry.
Mask areas with 3M™ Precision Masking Tape.
Back up masking tape with 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape or 3M Scotch® Performance Masking Tape.
Mask entire surface with 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film.
Mix gelcoat in 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.
Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.
Hold spray gun 15cm-20cm from surface and apply gelcoat.
Clean the new external composite surface with approved cleaner.
Sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 320+ and then 400+ grade abrasives using a Soft Interface Pad.
Refine scratches using P800 grade 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.
Compound the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound and a 3M™ Perfect-It™ Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad.
Use a Rotary Polishing machine at 1400-1800 rpm.
Polish with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Compound + Polish and a wool compounding pad at 1400-1800 rpm.
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries.
Clean the surface with approved cleaner.
Sand the surface using a DA sander and 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 80+ grade abrasive discs.
Apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
After it sets, apply dry guide coat and sand with 120+ grade, then finish sanding with 220+ grade.
Clean the surface.
Clean the surface with an approved cleaner before any other step.
Compound the surface.
Compound with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Fast Cut Plus Extreme and a 3M™ wool or green foam compounding pad using a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm.
Polish the surface.
Polish the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Ultrafina SE Polish and a 3M™ wool or blue foam polishing pad at 1400-1800 rpm.
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries.
Mix bottom paint in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup (remove lid filter)
Use a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun, holding it 15cm-20cm from the surface to apply the paint

constraints.expression: Approved cleaners must be used for cleaning the composite surface before sanding.
constraints.text: Approved cleaners must be used for cleaning the composite surface before sanding.

constraints.expression: The repair area should be free of moisture before sanding.
constraints.text: The repair area should be free of moisture before sanding.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wash and 3M™ Perfect-It™ High Performance Cloth for cleaning.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wash and 3M™ Perfect-It™ High Performance Cloth for cleaning.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive discs, grade 80+ for sanding.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive discs, grade 80+ for sanding.

constraints.expression: Dry guide coat must be applied and re-sanded before final application of gelcoat.
constraints.text: Dry guide coat must be applied and re-sanded before final application of gelcoat.

constraints.expression: Pressurized air can be used instead of approved cleaner for blowing off the repair area.
constraints.text: Pressurized air can be used instead of approved cleaner for blowing off the repair area.

constraints.expression: The filler should be applied in two stages: blister repair filler and premium filler.
constraints.text: The filler should be applied in two stages: blister repair filler and premium filler.

constraints.expression: Wait 30 minutes after applying the first filler before feathering the repair.
constraints.text: Wait 30 minutes after applying the first filler before feathering the repair.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ Marine Blister Repair Filler for the initial fill stage.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ Marine Blister Repair Filler for the initial fill stage.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ Marine Premium Filler for the final fill stage.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ Marine Premium Filler for the final fill stage.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive discs for sanding.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II abrasive discs for sanding.

constraints.expression: Ensure the area is clean before applying filler.
constraints.text: Ensure the area is clean before applying filler.

constraints.expression: Surface must be dry before masking.
constraints.text: Surface must be dry before masking.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Precision Masking Tape for initial masking.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Precision Masking Tape for initial masking.

constraints.expression: Apply 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape or 3M Scotch® Performance Masking Tape over the 3M™ Precision Masking Tape.
constraints.text: Apply 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape or 3M Scotch® Performance Masking Tape over the 3M™ Precision Masking Tape.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film for final masking.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film for final masking.

constraints.expression: Mix gelcoat in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.
constraints.text: Mix gelcoat in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.

constraints.expression: Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.
constraints.text: Adjust 3M™ Performance Spray Gun settings.

constraints.expression: Keep spray gun 15cm-20cm from surface while applying gelcoat.
constraints.text: Keep spray gun 15cm-20cm from surface while applying gelcoat.

constraints.expression: The surface must be cleaned before sanding.
constraints.text: The surface must be cleaned before sanding.

constraints.expression: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the surface.
constraints.text: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the surface.

constraints.expression: If the surface has scratches, use P800 grade abrasives for sanding.
constraints.text: If the surface has scratches, use P800 grade abrasives for sanding.

constraints.expression: Use a soft interface pad when sanding.
constraints.text: Use a soft interface pad when sanding.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound for compounding.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound for compounding.

constraints.expression: Use a 3M™ Perfect-It™ Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad for compounding.
constraints.text: Use a 3M™ Perfect-It™ Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad for compounding.

constraints.expression: Use a rotary polishing machine for polishing.
constraints.text: Use a rotary polishing machine for polishing.

constraints.expression: Operate the rotary polishing machine between 1400-1800 rpm.
constraints.text: Operate the rotary polishing machine between 1400-1800 rpm.

constraints.expression: The gelcoat compounding and polishing step (S1) must be performed at a speed between 1400 and 1800 rpm.
constraints.text: The gelcoat compounding and polishing step (S1) must be performed at a speed between 1400 and 1800 rpm.

constraints.expression: The boat wax application step (S2) must be done before the wax dries.
constraints.text: The boat wax application step (S2) must be done before the wax dries.

constraints.expression: The surface must be cleaned before sanding.
constraints.text: The surface must be cleaned before sanding.

constraints.expression: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the surface.
constraints.text: Use only approved cleaners for cleaning the surface.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 80+ grade abrasive discs for sanding.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 80+ grade abrasive discs for sanding.

constraints.expression: Apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler and allow it to set before applying dry guide coat.
constraints.text: Apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler and allow it to set before applying dry guide coat.

constraints.expression: Sand the surface after applying dry guide coat with 120+ grade sandpaper.
constraints.text: Sand the surface after applying dry guide coat with 120+ grade sandpaper.

constraints.expression: Finally, sand the surface with 220+ grade sandpaper.
constraints.text: Finally, sand the surface with 220+ grade sandpaper.

constraints.expression: Clean the surface after each sanding step.
constraints.text: Clean the surface after each sanding step.

constraints.expression: Surface must be dry before applying masking tapes and film.
constraints.text: Surface must be dry before applying masking tapes and film.

constraints.expression: Primer should be applied within 24 hours after mixing.
constraints.text: Primer should be applied within 24 hours after mixing.

constraints.expression: Use only 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cups for mixing materials.
constraints.text: Use only 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cups for mixing materials.

constraints.expression: Keep a minimum distance of 15cm-20cm between the spray gun and the surface during application.
constraints.text: Keep a minimum distance of 15cm-20cm between the spray gun and the surface during application.

constraints.expression: The surface must be cleaned before compounding.
constraints.text: The surface must be cleaned before compounding.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Perfect-It™ Fast Cut Plus Extreme for compounding.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Perfect-It™ Fast Cut Plus Extreme for compounding.

constraints.expression: Use a 3M™ wool or green foam compounding pad for compounding.
constraints.text: Use a 3M™ wool or green foam compounding pad for compounding.

constraints.expression: Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm for compounding.
constraints.text: Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm for compounding.

constraints.expression: Use 3M™ Perfect-It™ Ultrafina SE Polish for polishing.
constraints.text: Use 3M™ Perfect-It™ Ultrafina SE Polish for polishing.

constraints.expression: Use a 3M™ wool or blue foam polishing pad for polishing.
constraints.text: Use a 3M™ wool or blue foam polishing pad for polishing.

constraints.expression: Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm for polishing.
constraints.text: Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm for polishing.

constraints.expression: Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax only after polishing.
constraints.text: Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax only after polishing.

constraints.expression: Wipe off the wax before it dries.
constraints.text: Wipe off the wax before it dries.

constraints.expression: The 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup should be free of impurities before mixing the bottom paint.
constraints.text: The 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup should be free of impurities before mixing the bottom paint.

constraints.expression: The 3M™ Performance Spray Gun should be held at a distance of 15cm-20cm from the surface during painting.
constraints.text: The 3M™ Performance Spray Gun should be held at a distance of 15cm-20cm from the surface during painting.
